actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify certain existing limitations on private business use of facilities financed with tax-exempt bonds.
short_title: Private Activity Bond Clarification Act of 1999

summary.text: Private Activity Bond Clarification Act of 1999 - Amends subpart A (Private Activity Bonds) of part IV (Tax Exemption Requirements for State and Local Bonds) of the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of the term "private business use."

titles.title: Private Activity Bond Clarification Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify certain existing limitations on private business use of facilities financed with tax-exempt bonds.
